p: Fitriana et al. and Wright et al. reported antioxidants properties of different extracts of M. oleifera leaves, where IC50 value was relatively higher as compared to IC50 value in the present study [ 23, 25]. Moreover, in the study by Wright et al., the IC50 value of all the M. oleifera extracts was found to be higher than the IC50 value of the present study.
